kw.name: Set Environment Variable
kw.doc: Sets an environment variable to a specified value.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.name: Delete All Cookies
kw.doc: Deletes all cookies.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current URL is exactly `url`.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Hotel Accomodation - login page'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Hotel Accomodation - login page'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
